These pictures 📷 are from our last course in Lithuania. If you want to experience the X-perience of a seminar 🎓with us, write to 👉🏽educacion@x-presion.eu📨
Upcoming date 📆8th and 9th of  May #Xpresionpixel level 1👾. 📆29th and 30th of May Disruptive collection (colour)

Estás 📷fotos son de nuestro último curso en Lituania. Si quieres vivir la X-periencia de un seminario con nosotros🎓, escribe a 👉🏽educacion@x-presion.eu 📨

Próximas fechas 📆 8 y 9 de mayo #xpresionpixel 👾 nivel 1. 29 y 30 de mayo Disruptive collection (colour) // #xpresioncreativos #fashion  #seminar #bedistuptive #peluqueria #hairstyles #hairideas #волосы #лечениеволос #красивыеволосы #ヘアスタイル #헤어스타일 #헤어스타일링 #헤어스타일리스트 #发型

We are super excited for the event we have the 14th of may with this amazing line up that @schwarzkopfpro have ready for the Western Europe Event. It's always a great honor to share stage again with our friends and  beloved @tylerjhair & @lesleyjennison, and  to meet @mrkimVo, @hookerandyoung  for the first time. So if you are in London you don't want to miss this!!! ⚡️

#xpresioncreativos #hairshow #schwarzkopf #london #pixel #pixelhair #xpresionpixel #pixelatedhair #peluqueria #hairstyles #hairideas #волосы #лечениеволос #красивыеволосы #ヘアスタイル #헤어스타일 #헤어스타일링 #헤어스타일리스트 #发型

#TBT From now on, we’re going to take Thursday to tell you all a little bit of the history of X-presion. It’s been almost 1️⃣0️⃣years since we created 0️⃣1️⃣0️⃣collection, a design inspired by the anime film @ghostintheshell hell that is currently in cinemas. At the time, we had a strong attraction for everything electronic and digital.👾💽 This was reflected in our designs through the use of 0 and 1 binary codes. It was even conveyed through our hair colors with help of Braille color. We’ve got 1000 stories we could tell you. It’s one of the best productions and the most underground that we’ve done with an incredible team. In due time, the young motivated people who started it are now creating some of the best advertising campaigns for Mango, Uterque, doing special effects for Hollywood , videos for Jean Paul Gaultier, renowned tattoo artist or are even well known artists like Vinila 🙌 @gusandlo @miguelmacayaten @bruno_galan_ruiz  @vinilavonbismark @monabellatattoo and much more…an unbelievable team. Although it was the 2nd best collection of the year for Grand Trophy at AIPP I’ll stick with the collector’s deluxe edition of the book/dvd which is a work of art. (all of the artistic elements in it have been created) 🛒🛍It can be bought in the bio 👆 
#xpresioncreativos #shorthair #avantgarde #anime #manga #ghostintheshell  #fashion  #peluqueria #hairstyles #hairideas #волосы #лечениеволос #красивыеволосы #ヘアスタイル #헤어스타일 #헤어스타일링 #헤어스타일리스트 #发型

X-presion is not only an R&D studio is also a Production company  and in this case we have developed the latest campaign for @fudgehair . Created taking care of all the details to highlight 3 beautiful colors of the line Ash Infusions. Technical and artistic innovation with new services for customers. Trendy, urban and fresh... Who wants to see the whole collection?? ..... In this picture we used NEW Headpaint Rose Quartz
/////////// // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////X-presion no es solo el equipo de peluqueros es también una productora y en este caso hemos desarrollado la última campaña de fotos y video para Fudge . Creada cuidando todos los detalles para resaltar 3 preciosos colores de la línea Ash Infusions . Innovación técnica y artística con nuevos servicios para los clientes. Trendy, urbana, fresca y actual...¿Quién quiere ver la coleccion entera?? 👀 #hair #xpresioncreativos #fashion #makeup #peluqueria #hairstyles #hairideas  #braids #лечениеволос

A rare #xpresionpixel colour done on a light peach blond base prepared with @uberliss , this was the second test with the Uberliss treatment and we are beginning to think this is a great ally when making X-presion pixels. X-PRESION PIXEL SEMINAR. 👾¿QUÉ?: Aprenderás  el proceso creativo que utiliza para llevar a cabo la técnica #XpresionPixel 
Este curso es la mejor manera de conocer de principio a fin las claves de cómo X-presion crea en el cabello las ilusiones ópticas que imagina en su mente y cómo controla cualquier mínimo detalle es, sin duda, una oportunidad para entender los procesos creativos del primer estudio de I+D+i del mundo de la peluquería.
📆¿CUÁNDO?: 8 y 9 de Mayo. 📍¿DÓNDE?: #xpresionstudio en el corazón de Madrid.///////////////////////////////////
👾WHAT?: You will learn the creative process you use to perform the #XpresionPixel technique.
This course is the best way to get to know the keys to how X-pressure creates in the hair the optical illusions you imagine in your mind and how you control any small detail is undoubtedly an opportunity to understand the creative processes of the The first R & D & i study in the world of hairdressing.
📆WHEN?: 8th and 9th of May. 📍WHERE?: #xpresionstudio in the city center of Madrid. +INFO: educacion@x-presion.eu #pixelatedhair #hair #pixel #pixelhair #xpresioncreativos #bedisruptive  #fashion #makeup #peluqueria #hairstyles #hairideas  #волосы #лечениеволос
